heading: Client ID #{{clientId}}
description: Welcome to your dashboard. Here, you can speak to experts, explore personalized news, education, and investment opportunities.

insights.title: Latest insights
insights.discalimer: We've picked a few articles and videos to learn more about The Family Office and our investment strategies.

portfolioActivity.title: Portfolio activity
portfolioActivity.subTitle: View expected events for the next 30 days for the expected cash inflows and outflows in your portfolio.

distributionAccordion.title: Distribution
distributionAccordion.description: A distribution of ${{dealAmount}} from your {{dealName}} should reach your account

capitalCallAccordion.title: Capital call
capitalCallAccordion.description: Funds totaling ${{dealAmount}} are expected to be transferred from your account towards a capital call from {{dealName}}

exitAccordion.description: {{dealName}} is expected to exit and distribute funds ${{dealAmount}} to your account

portfolioActivity.activityNote: *Any dates or amounts appearing on the Portfolio Activity (above) are based upon a best effort basis, and as such are suggestive, subject to change and should not be deemed final.
portfolioActivity.noEventNote: No events are planned for the next 30 days.
